title: This powerful MagSafe-ready iPhone power bank is just $26 today
content:
Macworld

While it’s true that iPhones have excellent battery life, it never hurts to have a power bank in your bag so you can recharge on the go. Today’s deal is a great one: The Baseus Magnetic power bank is on sale for $25.59 at Amazon, down from its usual $40, but only if you have a Prime membership. (If you’re buying two or more you save even more with the on-page promotional codes.)

The power bank has a 10,000mAh capacity, which should give you about more than one full charge for whatever iPhone you’re using. This Baseus model was built to support up to two devices at once, so you can use the 7.5W wireless charging by placing your device on the power bank and the 10W wired charging by plugging in the USB-C cable.

The cool thing about this model is that it comes with a foldable kickstand, so you can even prop your phone on it so you can continue using it. It also boasts a strong magnet so your phone will stay in place.

In our review of the model with a built-in USB-C cable, we praised the design and performance, and speedy wired charging. So forget your charging woes and go get yourself a magnetic portable power bank from Baseus for a mere $25.59 at Amazon.
